posts.title: Mukesh Khanna Announces Shaktimaan Trilogy
posts.body: It's time to tell the world that Shaktimaan  is being reincarnated. Yes, friends of Shaktimaan, I am now officially stating that I am bringing Shaktimaan 2 soon - wrote Mukesh Khanna

posts.title: IPL 2020, CSK vs SRH: MS Dhoni Says We Are Making Same Mistakes Again After Loss To SunRisers Hyderabad
posts.body: IPL 2020, CSK vs SRH: MS Dhoni admitted that his side needed to get a lot of things right, having been guilty of repeating the same mistakes after a close defeat against SRH.

posts.title: Modern Family Star Sofia Vergara Tops Forbes List Of Highest Paid Actresses
posts.body: According to Forbes, with production of big Hollywood projects shut because of the pandemic, most of the actresses made it to the list owing to their collaborations with television and streaming platforms.
